Episodes.Title: Men of the Houses
Episodes.Plot: In Boyle, Ireland in 1989, Martin Moone has made a somewhat unusual friend.

Episodes.GuestStars: Brendan Frayne, Cillian Frayne, Simon Delaney, Stephen Gillic, Patrick McDonnell, John O'Dowd, Robert Donnelly, Mark Huberman

Episodes.Title: Bunch of Marys
Episodes.Plot: Martin befriends new boy Trevor in order to dine on his family's regular gourmet meals while Debra is too distracted with political campaigning to feed her youngest child. Ma Moone and her friends hope to incite girl power in the local area by canvassing for politician Mary Robinson, but they're less than thrilled when they're forced to turn to fishy rich man Francie Feeley for funding.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Lightbox Provisional Classification. Official NZ Rating To Be Confirmed.

Episodes.Title: Another Prick in the Wall
Episodes.Plot: Using the battle for the bathroom as an opportunity to catch extra zeds, Martin falls foul of Sinead's pranks when she covers him in make-up while he's asleep. Unable to get to a mirror, Martin heads off to school unaware of his Boy George-esque look...
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Lightbox Provisional Classification. Official NZ Rating To Be Confirmed.
Episodes.GuestStars: Stephen Gillic, Norma Sheahan, Jessica Hynes, Johnny Vegas, Nuala Kelly, Pat McGrath

Episodes.Title: Dark Side of the Moone
Episodes.Plot: Uncle Danny arrives just in time for Martin's birds-and-the-bees talk with Mum and Dad. Sean seeks solace with other imaginary friends when Martin upsets him.
